title: BRAND's Ult DOESN'T BOUNCE bug CONFIRMED!
body:
Hi I am a BRAND MAIN with hundreds of brand games. I understand what happened to his ult after the update. However Im pretty sure what i just saw was a bug here's what happened:

So I stunned enemy Lux right next to 2 minions. She was literally a Teemo away from them OR LESS. Then I ulted her and guess what happened? The ult just hit lux and disappeared, even thoough there were 2 minions literally right next to her.

Not sure whats triggering this bug, but what happened was the split second just before my ult landed, lux was out of stun and used shield. Perhaps when enemy champion (lux) shield JUST BEFORE (miliseconds) Brand's ult lands and there are only minions beside enemy champ, the ult will disappear? Not sure but it is what happened and the enemy lux also saw that happen and think its a bug. Since Riot recently modified his ult coding to fix a previous bug, perhaps they messed something up which caused a new bug? PLEASE LOOK INTO THIS RIOT. :)
